doc.title: Matlock

credit.role: Betsy Rhodes (credited as Cherie Currie Hays)
Police Capt. Edward Hanna/The Mad Hatter

doc.plot: Ben Matlock is a VERY expensive criminal defense attorney who charges a $100,000 to take a case. Fortunately, he's worth every penny as he and his associates defend his clients by finding the REAL killer.
